parameters: Hurry up and set the explosives!
Once we blow through here, we’ll have access to the reactor.

\nThey’re going to try to breach the main passage to the reactor by blasting through it.
Stop them at all costs!!
\n<Cissnei>Understood. I'm not going to let that happen.
\n<Cissnei>Tseng, I've stopped them from arming the bomb.
You've helped avert what could have been a disaster.
\}(Reno should have been here by now...)
